entry.title: Current Conditions: -5.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Daniel's Harbour 7:30 PM NST Sunday 19 February 2023
Temperature: -5.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.4 kPa rising
Humidity: 61 %
Wind Chill: -12
Dewpoint: -12.0°C
Wind: NW 20 km/h gust 30 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 9 except minus 18 inland.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 9 except minus 18 inland. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High plus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon. Snow beginning late in the afternoon. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 then south 30 gusting to 60 near noon. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 12 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Rain mixed with snow. Temperature steady near plus 1.
entry.summary: Snow changing to rain mixed with snow in the evening then to flurries before morning. Fog patches developing after midnight. Rainfall amount 5 to 10 mm. Snowfall amount 2 cm inland and over higher terrain. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 60 becoming southwest 20 gusting to 40 before morning. Temperature steady near plus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Sunday 19 February 2023
